text: It Should Happen to You is a 1954 American romantic comedy movie. It was directed by George Cukor. Actors include Judy Holliday, Jack Lemmon, Peter Lawford, Michael O'Shea, and Wendy Barrie. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1955. ==Other websites== * * Category:1954 comedy movies Category:1954 romance movies Category:1954 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: It Should Happen to You
